text: The Brothers Grimm is a 2005 Czech British American fantasy adventure comedy movie directed by Terry Gilliam and starring Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey, Jonathan Pryce, Julian Bleach, Monica Bellucci, Anna Rust. ==Other websites== * * Category:2005 comedy movies Category:2005 adventure movies Category:2005 fantasy movies Category:2000s Czech movies Category:Czech adventure movies Category:Czech comedy movies Category:Czech fantasy movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Terry Gilliam
title: The Brothers Grimm (movie)
